title: perpetual autorenewal
extract: An automatic renewal clause typically looks something like this: ... Also known as a self-renewal or evergreen clause, it acts to perpetually renew a contract if notice to terminate is not provided within a generally specific and relatively small window of time (for example, 30 days prior to the end of the term).Jun 10, 2015
